Vatic-Gurobipy
  • construct_models_gurobi

construct_models_gurobi

Functions to Add Variables and Constraints to the Models

params_gurobi.py

Load and validate input of grid data to gurobi models

construct_models_gurobi.params_gurobi.default_params(model: Model, model_data: VaticModelData | None = None) → Model[source]

Call main function to load grid data into parameters of gurobi model without renewable costs

construct_models_gurobi.params_gurobi.load_base_params(model: Model, model_data: VaticModelData | None = None, renew_costs: bool = False) → Model[source]

Main Function to Load grid data into parameters of gurobi model

construct_models_gurobi.params_gurobi.renew_cost_params(model: Model, model_data: VaticModelData | None = None) → Model[source]

Call main function to load grid data into parameters of gurobi model with renewable costs

power_vars_gurobi.py

Add power generated and reactive power generated variables

construct_models_gurobi.power_vars_gurobi.garver_power_vars(model: Model) → Model[source]

Add PowerGeneratedAboveMinimum variables, the main variable representing generator output.

Originally proposed in L. L. Garver. Power generation scheduling by integer programming-development of theory. Power Apparatus and Systems, Part III. Transactions of the American Institute of Electrical Engineers, 81(3): 730–734, April 1962. ISSN 0097-2460.

reserve_vars_gurobi.py

Add maximum power available above minimum variables, reserve provided variables, and generator output limits constraints

construct_models_gurobi.reserve_vars_gurobi.MLR_reserve_vars(model: Model) → Model[source]

Add reserves provided variables as in G. Morales-Espana, J. M. Latorre, and A. Ramos. Tight and compact MILP formulation for the thermal unit commitment problem. IEEE Transactions on Power Systems, 28(4):4897–4908, 2013.

construct_models_gurobi.reserve_vars_gurobi.check_reserve_requirement(model)[source]
construct_models_gurobi.reserve_vars_gurobi.garver_power_avail_vars(model: Model) → Model[source]

Add MaximumPowerAvailableAboveMinimum variables based on the adaption of the idea from the Carrion-Arroyo paper for maximum power available to consider maximum power available over minimum

non_dispatchable_vars_gurobi.py

Add non dispatchabe power used variables

construct_models_gurobi.non_dispatchable_vars_gurobi.file_non_dispatchable_vars(model: Model) → Model[source]

Add non dispatchable power variables

generation_limits_gurobi.py

Add generatoin limit constraints

construct_models_gurobi.generation_limits_gurobi.MLR_generation_limits(model: Model) → Model[source]

Add MLR generation limits based on Equations (9)–(11) from G. Morales-Espana, J. M. Latorre, and A. Ramos. Tight and compact MILP formulation for the thermal unit commitment problem. IEEE Transactions on Power Systems, 28(4):4897–4908, 2013.

construct_models_gurobi.generation_limits_gurobi.pan_guan_gentile_KOW_generation_limits(model: Model) → Model[source]

Add pan_guan_gentile_generation_limits plus the generalized upper bound limits introduced in the text equations (32)–(34)

ramping_limits_gurobi.py

Add ramping up and down limits

construct_models_gurobi.ramping_limits_gurobi.damcikurt_ramping(model: Model) → Model[source]

Add ramping limits based on Equations (3) and (18) from Pelin Damci-Kurt, Simge Kucukyavuz, Deepak Rajan, and Alper Atamturk. A polyhedral study of production ramping. Mathematical Programming, 158(1-2):175–205, 2016.

production_costs_gurobi.py

Add production cost constraints, piecewise production variables, and production cost variables

construct_models_gurobi.production_costs_gurobi.CA_production_costs(model: Model) → Model[source]

Add production costs constraints with additional variables for each piecewise linear segment based on equations (7)–(11) in M. Carrion and J. M. Arroyo. A computationally efficient mixed-integer linear formulation for the thermal unit commitment problem. IEEE Transactions on Power Systems, 21(3):1371–1378, Aug 2006. ISSN 0885-8950. doi: 10.1109/TPWRS.2006.876672.

construct_models_gurobi.production_costs_gurobi.KOW_production_costs_tightened(model)[source]

Add production costs constraints based on Ben Knueven, Jim Ostrowski, and Jean-Paul Watson. Exploiting identical generators in unit commitment. IEEE Transactions on Power Systems, 33(4), 2018. Equations (19d)–(19h) with some tightening for when SU != SD

uptime_downtime_gurobi.py

construct_models_gurobi.uptime_downtime_gurobi.rajan_takriti_UT_DT(model: Model) → Model[source]

Uptime/downtime constraints (3) and (4) from

D. Rajan and S. Takriti. Minimum up/down polytopes of the unit commitment problem with start-up costs. IBM Res. Rep, 2005.

startup_costs_gurobi.py

Add startup costs constraints and the related variables

construct_models_gurobi.startup_costs_gurobi.KOW_startup_costs(model: Model, add_startup_cost_var=True) → Model[source]

Add start up cost constaints based on Ben Knueven, Jim Ostrowski, and Jean-Paul Watson. A novel matching formulation for startup costs in unit commitment, 2017. URL http://www.optimization-online.org/DB_FILE/2017/03/5897.pdf.

construct_models_gurobi.startup_costs_gurobi.MLR_startup_costs(model: Model, add_startup_cost_var=True) → Model[source]

Add startup cost constraints based on equations (2)–(3) from G. Morales-Espana, J. M. Latorre, and A. Ramos. Tight and compact MILP formulation for the thermal unit commitment problem. IEEE Transactions on Power Systems, 28(4):4897–4908, 2013.

services_gurobi.py

Pseudo functions to add storage services and ancillary services in the future

construct_models_gurobi.services_gurobi.ancillary_services(model: Model) → Model[source]

Add ancillary services: regulation, spinning reserve, nonspinning reserve, operational reserve, flexible ramp

construct_models_gurobi.services_gurobi.storage_services(model: Model) → Model[source]

power_balance_gurobi.py

Add systemwise power balance variables and constraints to impose the constraints on supply-demand mismatch at each bus level and impose the power flow constraints

construct_models_gurobi.power_balance_gurobi.ptdf_power_flow(model: Model, slacks: bool | None = True) → Model[source]

Add constraints to impose the upper bounds on supply-demand mismatch and ensure the power flow balance

reserve_requirement_gurobi.py

Add reserve constraints and reserve shortfall variables

construct_models_gurobi.reserve_requirement_gurobi.CA_reserve_constraints(model: Model) → Model[source]

Add reserve constraints with slacks given by equation (3) in Carrion, M. and Arroyo, J. (2006) A Computationally Efficient Mixed-Integer Liner Formulation for the Thermal Unit Commitment Problem. IEEE Transactions on Power Systems, Vol. 21, No. 3, Aug 2006.

construct_models_gurobi.reserve_requirement_gurobi.MLR_reserve_constraints(model: Model) → Model[source]

Add reserve constraints with slacks given by equation (5) in G. Morales-Espana, J. M. Latorre, and A. Ramos. Tight and compact MILP formulation for the thermal unit commitment problem. IEEE Transactions on Power Systems, 28(4):4897–4908, 2013.

objective_gurobi.py

Add the total cost objective

construct_models_gurobi.objective_gurobi.basic_objective(model: Model) → Model[source]

Calculate the total cost objective
